ComicInfo.Summary:
MAD presents the 50 Worst Things About Video Games, an exclusive list of the most annoying, aggravating and highly obnoxious stuff that drives gamers crazy! MAD also makes divorce easier on kids, initiates a street gang investigation and finds out what celebrities laugh at!
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2023-12-11 23:07:28. [Issue ID 129291]
